name: iterant-cloudflare-proxy
description: Cloudflare Worker that proxies requests to the Iterant platform for seamless landing page integration
author: Iterant AI

BRAND_ID.description: Your Iterant Brand ID. Find it in your [Iterant Dashboard](https://dashboard.iterant.ai) under Settings > Domains.

TARGET_HOST.description: Iterant platform host. Default: `sites.iterant.ai`. Only change if instructed by Iterant support.

CACHE_TTL.description: Cache duration in seconds. Default: `3600` (1 hour). Set to `0` to disable caching.
